column4: hi i need help with my u3w firewall on ubuntu 10.4. FIrstly, my mirc cannot dcc reveive unless I open ports 1024 to 65535. However, i configured my mirc to set dcc between ports 1024-5000.
I tried opening ports 1024-5000 with my firewall, but i still cannot dcc send or receive
anyone who can help me with the u3w configuration with mirc please PM me
are you arsking about taht mIRC irc client?
